SELECT
r.MODEL_NAME AS groupName
r.MAKER AS groupName
,
CONCAT( YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(r.RECALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')), ' Q', QUARTER(STR_TO_DATE(r.RECALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')) ) AS periodLabel
CONCAT( YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(r.RECALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')), CASE WHEN MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(r.RECALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d')) <= 6 THEN ' 상반기' ELSE ' 하반기' END ) AS periodLabel
DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE(r.RECALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m' ) AS periodLabel
,
-- 리콜 건수: RECALL 고유 ID 개수 COUNT(DISTINCT r.ID) AS recallCount
FROM RECALL r
WHERE 1 = 1
AND r.RECALL_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND r.RECALL_DATE <= #{endDate}
AND r.MAKER = #{maker}
AND UPPER(r.MODEL_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{modelKeyword}), '%')
GROUP BY
r.MODEL_NAME
r.MAKER
, periodLabel
ORDER BY periodLabel ASC, recallCount DESC
